        \definecolor{bgcolor}{RGB}{70,70,70}
        \definecolor{textcolor}{RGB}{209,213,219}
        \definecolor{headingcolor}{RGB}{229,231,235}
        \definecolor{linkblue}{RGB}{96,165,250}
        \pagecolor{bgcolor}
        \color{textcolor}
        \allsectionsfont{\color{headingcolor}}
